items.title: Trump says non-US movies to be hit with 100% tariffs
items.description: The president blamed foreign-made movies for the American film industry's "very fast death".

items.title: Israel security cabinet approves plan to expand Gaza offensive
items.description: The Israeli military has called up tens of thousands of reservists, saying it is aiming to increase pressure on Hamas.

items.title: Nationalist Simion wins first round of Romanian election rerun
items.description: Romania's previous presidential election was cancelled over allegations of campaign fraud and Russian interference.

items.title: Trump orders reopening of notorious Alcatraz prison
items.description: President Trump says the famous island prison off San Francisco is to be reopened to house "ruthless and violent" offenders.

items.title: NZ airport to remove Hobbit-themed eagle sculptures
items.description: For more than a decade, the giant eagles have cast a watchful eye over visitors at Wellington Airport.
